job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: ltpgtwere hiring for a fast growing series a startup who have spunoff from a toptier us university their leading ai product is transforming the lives of patients and physicians by reimagining medical workflows with voice and machine learningltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgttheir product prepares medical charts by listening to patient encounters saving up to hours a day for doctors theyre looking for a senior nlp engineer to improve current machine learning models working with the largest datasets of physicianpatient encounters ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwhy not join a team of toptier university alumni working with stateoftheart machine learning whilst revolutionizing healthcare ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtyou willltpgtltulgtltligttake ownership of the architecture of machine learning modelsltligtltligtbuild iterate and deploy models ltligtltligtwork alongside leadership to define roadmaps representing ml model architectureltligtltligtimprove efficiency of the humanintheloop component ltligtltligtwork on a variety of nlp problemsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtyou haveltpgtltulgtltligtmasters or above in computer science or related field ltligtltligtexperience deploying machine learning models into production ltligtltligtan interest in healthcareltligtltligtexperience working with natural language processing ltligtltligtexpertise with python and deep learning frameworksltligtltligtthe ability to work in a fast paced environment ltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtbig cloud is acting as a vendor to this position which is a direct hireltemgtltpgt
